element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text:
Shows a ROC (Receiver Operating Characteristic) curve.
ROC curves can be used to assess the validity of a predictive model.

element.name: ADDITIONAL_INFO
element.text: * Benito de Pando, B. y peñas de Giles, J. (2007): "Aplicación de modelos de distribución de especies a la conservación de la biodiversidad en el sureste de la Península Ibérica", GeoFocus (Artículos), nº 7, p. 100-119, ISSN: 1578-5157 * Modelos de distribución basados en algoritmos de presencia-ausencia (Fielding y Bell 1997, Segurado y Araújo 2004, Muñoz y Felicísimo 2004) y en algoritmos de solo presencia (Phillips et al., 2006). * Fielding, A.H and Bell, J.F (1997). A review of methods for the assessment of prediction errors in conservation presence absence models. Environmental Conservation 24: 38-49.

element.name: INPUT
element.text: Suitability layer, with value in the 0-1 range

element.name: FIELD
element.text: The field with presence/absence information. A value equals to zero means absence. Any other value means presence.
